name: sugar & spice
description:
Our Core Team includes three team members:

Shir Avidar  : Code Architect + Programmer

Sivan Calaora : Producer + Level Designer

Inbar katzenelson :Narrator + Game Designer

Story

the story of "Sugar & Spice" is about a young girl named cece that just want
to do what every kid wants eat lots of candy and not vegetables.

cece will jump crouch and avoid obstacles/ vegetables.

her goal is eat enough candy move faster and faster and defeat the evil boss that took away
all the colors of the world the way she imagines it .

Gameplay 

 In order to win the game, finish all levels by collecting enough candy and defeat the final boss.

Once the player finishes all stages and defeated the boss, they will be proclaimed victorious.
